column2: svn4idea plugin, IDEA-96825: consider the "longest" (most specific) path...

column3: Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign, scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com
I have sent the signed agreement on 23.10.2013 20:30 via fax to JetBrains s.r.o..
It seems no custom filtering is necessary for file history, so I just removed it - all history should be shown correct now. See 9bba592.

And for your url correction logic - probably it'll also be useful for some other bug fixes, but I did not apply it now. Currently I think of using peg revisions for such cases (and not calculating previous paths manually).
